job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Data Scientist with experience in Python, SQL, and Pytorch and want to be part of an advanced technology company that provides growing companies, and investors access to a broad spectrum of curated data to enhance capital raising. Please read on!
Founded in 2013 we enabled buyers and sellers to discover the connections and opportunities that others have missed. We use AI, deep learning and NLP- driven algorithms to make data smarter and make raising growth capital efficient and intelligent. If this interests you Lets Talk!
What You Will Be Doing
As a Data Scientist you will be responsible for research and detect valuable data sources and automate collection processes. Perform preprocessing of structured and unstructured data. You will also modify and combine different models through ensemble modeling. Finally you will help develop and suggest solutions and strategies to business challenges.
What You Need for this Position
Must Have
Qualifications:
Ph.D./ M.S in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Data Science etc.)
3+ years expertise in Python and SQL
2+ years experience of working as a Data Scientist
PyTorch
ML/NLP
seq2seq
Tensorflow
Nice To Have
Named Entity Recognition (NER)
Kubeflow
AI/NLP
GCP tooling
What's In It for You
Competitive Salary: $120k-$175k
Health Insurance
Generous PTO
401K Match
Paid Vacation and Holidays
Office is located on 46th and Lex in NY
So, if you are a Data Scientist with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Dylan.Boisclair@Optello.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DB12-1642508 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Dylan Boisclair - Recruiter - Optello
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
